title: Register with a GP Surgery v2
description: A FHIR Questionnaire created from GP Registration Programme - GP IT Deliverables
purpose: To standardise the questions asked when registering for a GP Surgery within England

item.text: Who is registering with a GP?
What is your relationship to the person being registered?
What type of carer are you?
What is the name of the person being registered?
What is the your date of birth
Do you know your NHS Number?

code.display: Patient National Health Service number (observable entity)

item.text: You do not need to know their NHS number to continue. If you do not know it, you can tell us their full name instead.
Are you registering with a UK GP for the first time
What is the name of the GP surgery you want to leave?
Do you know the postcode used when you last registered with a UK GP?
What postcode did you use when you last registered with a UK GP?
Do you have a current UK address
What is your current UK address?
Do you go to any of the following for your education?
Enter details of where you go for your education - School
Enter details of where you go for your education - Nursery
Enter details of where you go for your education - Home School
Is anyone else involved in your care?
What is your sex as recorded on your NHS record?
Which of the following best describes your [Ethnic group] background?

valueCoding.display: Black African, Black British or Caribbean

code.display: Language for which interpreter is needed (observable entity)

item.text: Which language do you need an interpreter for?
Do you need a language interpreter for your GP appointments?
Would you have serious difficulty travelling to your nearest pharmacy to get medicines or medical appliances?
Do you live more than 1 mile from your nearest pharmacy?
Do you want to get your prescription items direct from {NAME OF SURGERY}?
Would you like to choose or change a pharmacy for your prescriptions?
Have you ever been a member of the UK Armed Forces or are a family member registered with the Defence Medical Services?
What are the details of your emergency contact?
Do you have an emergency contact?
What was the date you left the UK?
What was the date you returned to the UK?
Enter details of where you were born

code.display: Date of entry to United Kingdom (observable entity)

item.text: When did you enter the UK?
Do you have any of these documents?

valueCoding.display: I don't have any of these documents

item.text: Have you moved to the UK from EU, EEA or Switzerland?
Do you know your chargeable status?
Have you recently moved to the UK from abroad?
What was your previous UK address?
Have you ever lived at a previous UK address?
Have you got all your immunisations?
Alzheimers disease or dementia, asthma, cancer, diabetes, epilepsy, heart disease, high blood pressure, stroke, thyroid disease, other
About your current and pre-existing medical conditions?
Do you have any existing or pre-existing medical conditions?
Do you have any mental health conditions?
What type of carer do you have?
What type of carer are you?
About you or your carer's communication needs

code.display: Requires support for expressive communication needs (finding)

item.text: Do you or your carer need to be communicated with in an accessible form?
About you or your carer's access needs

code.display: Requires reasonable adjustment for health and care access (Equality Act 2010) (finding)

item.text: Do you or your carer need any reasonable adjustments to make your visit to the GP surgery accessible?

code.display: Current medication as reported by patient (observable entity)

item.text: Can you provide more details about your prescription medication?
Are any of these repeat prescriptions?
Do you currently take any prescription medication?

code.display: Number of alcohol units consumed on typical drinking day

item.text: How many units of alcohol do you drink on a typical day when you are drinking?
How often have you had six or more units of alcohol on a single occasion in the last year?
How often do you drink alcohol or have a drink containing alcohol?
Do you want important information from your GP record to be available to other health and care professionals?

valueCoding.display: Express consent for core and additional Summary Care Record dataset upload
Express consent for core Summary Care Record dataset upload
Dissent to share Summary Care Record
